_header: To waxen rich with great blame
_description: On the Avaricious Man — one couplet translating ‘Ditari nitor non curo quomodo ditor’ in John Grimestone’s preaching notebook

NLS18721.Transcription:
To waxen riche with gret blameI ne make no force of no
                    schame
NLS18721.Editions:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             A Descriptive Index of the English Lyrics in John of Grimestone’s
                Preaching Book.
Medium Ævum Monographs
         n.s. 2. Oxford, 1973: 9.
